entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is discussing Quidditch practice with him.

entities.name: Angelina
entities.description: A person who suggested a new move called the Sloth Grip Roll for Quidditch practice.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is discussing Quidditch practice with Ron and is buoyed by people's admiration for him.

entities.name: Gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts School that has a notice board where a large sign was affixed.

entities.name: Argus Filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who posts reminders of school rules on the Gryffindor notice board.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are discussing Quidditch practice together, indicating a close friendship between them.
Angelina is suggesting a new move for the Quidditch team, indicating that she is a member of the team.
People admire Harry, which buoys him up and makes him cheerful despite his least favorite classes.
